data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sasakawa, Koji (2016): Two new species of the ground beetle subgenus Sadonebria Ledoux & Roux, 2005 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Nebria) from Japan and first description of larvae of the subgenus. ZooKeys 578: 97-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.578.7424, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.578.7424
